quote_first: All she could tell me was that she%d gone to sleep shortly after listening to the Dvorak String Quartet at
quote_last: - they had twin beds - and didn%t stir until her husband woke her with news of the murder.
title: The Murder of Santa Claus
author: P.D. James

quote_last: they would enter the Farholme Gate, emerging a mere ten and a half minutes later at Bannermere Gate. Forty light-years away.
title: The Shadow and Night
author: Chris Walley

quote_time_case: Eleven o%clock, all but five minutes!
quote_last:
“But which eleven o%clock?”
“The eleven o%clock that is to decide life or death!...He told me so just before he went....He is terrible....He is quite mad: he tore off his mask and his yellow eyes shot flames!...”
title: The Phantom of the Opera
author: Gaston Leroux

quote_first:
Mr. Justice Wargrave said:
“It is now
quote_last: . I think we should summon Miss Brent to join our conclave.”
title: And Then There Were None
author: Agatha Christie
